sugawara:physicaldata: ゆnum_old　khaniye　 納税表記　官衙への申告（粘結なし）
schema:abstract: 05, Real Estate transfer(sale), Jumada al-awwal 14, 1342(Dec.23, 1923), issued by (late) Niyaz Akhund's heirs; his wife Niyaz Bibi bent-i  Husayn Bay, their son Muhammad Akhund, Qadir Akhund, Turdi Akhund,  and his daughter Padshah Bibi(in the custody of her mother Niaz Bibi), to  Imin Akhund(one of Niyaz AKhund's heirs) on their common land locates at Ayagh sozaq of Beshkerim.
schema:grant: <KAKENHI> 研究費 (Japan Society for the Promotion of Science)
